ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bards get a bow
ygData.msgSnippet: Kinda along the same lines. While I was killing forest giants in burning woods I looted  a 2h slashing pick. it said some war classes and BRD.. i was like ya
ygData.messageBody:
Kinda along the same lines. While I was killing forest giants in burning
woods I looted a 2h slashing pick. it said some war classes and BRD.. i was
like ya right.. sooo I put it in main and and used it.. hehe I actually
wore it and swung the darn thing as a 2h slasher. Its like 17 damage 4
million delay and 20 hp or somthing crappy but i was swinging for 18 damage
with it with 2 hands :)

just a little tidbit for yall

Tuldar Missednote 46th bard
Tarew marr
Nuldar Andhaka 51st necromancer
Tarew Marr
----- Original Message -----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, April 28, 2000 1:56 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards get a bow


> I want one just for looks sake. Much like my gnome wizard is usually seen
> wielding a pick, or an axe. Now he can even get a sword courtesy of
Kunark!
> I just love the looks I get when my wizard walks up on a group. My
hotkeyed
> reply is "What? You never seen a wizard with an axe to grind before?"
>
> Kitasi
>

>
>
> Um. Bards don't get archery skill. ANd who wants to carry around 8.5
> pounds for 3 dex?
> This is warrior,ranger,bard
>
> Perhaps it should have been Rogue? Or Paladin (someone who can use a bow)
> and was mis-keyed to bard?
